New Records: Manuel Neuer made his 38th appearance at a major competition, breaking a joint record with Bastian Schweinsteiger
Key Match Events: A goal was ruled out for an infringement in the box
The match was halted due to a thunderstorm
Joachim Andersen was penalised for handling the ball
Kai Havertz converted a penalty to give Germany the lead
Jamal Musiala scored a superb curling strike
Post-Match Reflections: Ange Postecoglou defended Michael Oliver's decisions
Roy Keane criticized the handball decision
Ian Wright expressed dissatisfaction with the offside law
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heavy rain delayed the match by 30 minutes
Germany's win was their third in four games at Euro 2024
Denmark had not won any of their last eight games at major competitions
